description:
Travel Mosaics 2 brings a unique take on a classic nonogram puzzle, offering varying difficulty settings, recognizable and fun images, trivia questions and much more.

The Walkers are going on a sightseeing tour to the most famous attractions Rome has to offer! Tag along and explore charming historic locations of the Eternal City as you solve colorful nonograms – it’s a journey of a lifetime!

Game Features:
- 120 carefully designed themed nonogram puzzles + 20 EXTRA levels + 20 NEW surprise bonus levels
- 3 difficulty modes to play around with
- Customizable playing field – choose from a variety of beautiful designs
- Test your skills in trivia! Answer fun questions about Rome
- Collect souvenirs and decorate the Walker’s living room

No guessing involved – every puzzle can be solved just by logic! But don’t worry, if you ever get stuck, you can take advantage of the 4 types of hints that can help you out.

The game utilizes Nintendo Switch™ features to their full potential. Play using your JoyCon™ controllers or use the touch screen.

Everyone can hop on board with the Walkers and enjoy the Roman Holiday – players of all ages are welcome!
name: Travel Mosaics 2: Roman Holiday
